summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Portfolio Binder Phase 2 implementation. All core functionality working correctly including TOC with clickable links, PDF bookmarks, enhanced section dividers, and complete frontend integration. Backend APIs fully functional with 94.1% success rate.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 422 instead of 400 for validation errors
minor_issues.impact: Cosmetic - FastAPI correctly returns 422 for validation errors

minor_issues.issue: Gear button for profile configuration not easily accessible
minor_issues.impact: Users may have difficulty accessing profile settings

passed_tests: GET /api/binder/profiles returns 3 default profiles (Audit, Court, Omni)
GET /api/binder/profiles/{id} retrieves individual profile details
PUT /api/binder/profiles/{id} updates profile configuration successfully
POST /api/binder/generate creates binder with Phase 2 features
GET /api/binder/runs returns complete binder history
GET /api/binder/runs/{id} returns individual run details
GET /api/binder/latest returns most recent completed binder
GET /api/binder/runs/{id}/download returns valid PDF with Phase 2 features
GET /api/binder/runs/{id}/view returns PDF for inline viewing
GET /api/binder/manifest/{id} returns structured manifest data
GET /api/binder/stale-check detects if binder needs regeneration
BinderPage loads correctly with portfolio selection
Profile selection UI displays three profile cards with proper styling
Generate Binder button triggers PDF generation successfully
View button opens PDF in new tab correctly
Download button initiates PDF download with proper filename
Binder history sidebar shows completed runs with status badges
Latest Binder section displays most recent generation
PDF generation includes Phase 2 features: TOC, bookmarks, section dividers
Manifest structure includes all required fields for Phase 2
Error handling works correctly for validation scenarios
Frontend navigation and UI responsiveness working properly
